    This is a (likely incomplete) list of important dates and event relating to AutoRL. Please tell us if we missed anything!

    Upcoming Dates

    • 19.03.25: Abstract paper deadline for AutoML’25
    • 14.02.25: Abstract paper deadline for RLC’25

    Past Dates

    • 23.01.25: Abstract paper deadline for ICML’25
    • 19.10.24: Theresa and André will be giving a half-day tutorial on AutoRL at ECAI 2024
    • 10.09.24: Theresa and André will be giving a tutorial on AutoRL at the international conference on AutoML
    • 06.09.24: Theresa and André will be giving a tutorial on AutoRL at the AutoML School
    • 26.07.24: First AutoRL@ICML Workshop
    • 08.05.24: Workshop paper deadline for this year’s AutoML Conf
    • 29.02.24: Full paper deadline for this year’s AutoML Conf
    • 01.03.24: Paper deadline for the first edition of the RL conference - a great initiative and likely an interesting venue for AutoRL research
    • NeurIPS’23 saw another edition of the ALOE workshop
    • The AutoML Conf‘23 was a hub for AutoML research, including of course AutoRL
